Text: Re SENIOR PURCHASING AGENT Mark It has been a long time since I have actively been a purchasign agent Some of the terms are new Basic knowledge of Uniform Commercial Code and General Contract Law However this doesnt mean that I cant learn in a quick note Otherwise I have done this job Kelly Original Message From To Sent Thursday July PM Subject SENIOR PURCHASING AGENT SENIOR PURCHASING AGENT ESSENTIAL FUNCTIONS Under direction form the Director of Purchasing and Contracts responsible for working with Engineering Project Management and construction to procure equipment materials and services so as to permit project completion in a timely manner with the required quality at the lowest cost consistent with timeliness and quality ESSENTIAL REQUIREMENTS Five years experience in the procurement of capital equipment and construction subcontracts Ability to work in a project team environment with multiple reporting lines Basic knowledge of Uniform Commercial Code and General Contract Law as well as strong indepth knowledge of procurement techniques procedures and policies required Knowledge of engineering and construction industry Experience in negotiating legal terms and conditions Strong verbal and written communication skills PC skills in word processing and spreadsheets required PREFERRED SKILLS NA SPECIAL CHARACTERISTICS NA CONTACT Send resumes to Via Email Via Fax NEPCO North Creek Parkway North Bothell WA Embedded image moved to file picpcx Job ID Department PURCHASING Company GLOBAL FUNCTIONS ENGINEER CONSTRUCT NEPCO Location BOTHELL WA Type Pay na FLSA class Manager LANDISJOHN Recruiter MFERGUSON Log na Grade SAL Response NA Relocation N Posting date JUN

Re CONSTRUCTION ENGINEER fitMark I like this one Although the essential functions discusses the major requirements I dont believe that any one person can meet all points I will need to update and learn more about item Otherwise I am a fit for this one Kelly Original Message From To Sent Thursday July PM Subject CONSTRUCTION ENGINEER CONSTRUCTION ENGINEER ESSENTIAL FUNCTIONS Primary Function Under direction from the Assistant Superintendent Resident Engineer Chief Construction Supervisor or Construction Supervisor or Construction Supervisor may perform a variety of engineering or supervisory functions in the construction phase of a project Typical Duties Reviews all documentation prints and correspondence relating to assigned areas of responsibility Prepares and maintains checklists punch list flow diagrams and procedures Coordinates between Construction Supervisors and Project Engineering to rectify technical problems associated with the construction phase of the project Inspects components for conformance to specifications and standards and equipment and rigging devices for suitability May supervise field survey parties in the layout of lines and grades and other site preparation work Coordinates the activities of contractor in their area of responsibility and monitors their activities to ensure that construction proceeds according to technical specifications within the construction schedule and in accordance with applicable safety regulations and quality requirements Assumes responsibilities of a Construction Supervisor when the work is being performed by contractor personnel rather than force account employees Performs locally required designs for temporary facilities Coordinates construction activities with the Quality Control function to satisfy the requirements or engineering codes such as ASME III and directs the preparation of required isometric drawings Maintains accurate records of work progress and keeps his Supervisor informed as to problem areas and delays Implements company policy of equal opportunity through affirmative action Performs other related duties as assigned ESSENTIAL REQUIREMENTS Skills Knowledge Qualifications and Experience Three to six years of experience in the construction of power and process facilities PREFERRED SKILLS NA SPECIAL CHARACTERISTICS NA CONTACT FAX EMail Embedded image moved to file picpcx Job ID Department ENGINEERING CONSTRUCTIO Company GLOBAL FUNCTIONS ENGINEER CONSTRUCT NEPCO Location na Type Pay na FLSA class Manager PETTY SRFRANKLIN Recruiter CBROWN Log na Grade SAL Response NA Relocation Y Posting date JUN

Re COMMISSIONING ENGINEER chanceMark Although I can read and under stand PIDs I feel that this one is more of an electrical engineers area of expertise Kelly Original Message From To Sent Thursday July PM Subject COMMISSIONING ENGINEER COMMISSIONING ENGINEER ESSENTIAL FUNCTIONS Under the direction and supervision of the Startup Supervisor is responsible for all startup electrical testing activities and approving their operation in a safe and proper manner This includes reviewing plant engineering documents and PIDs performing electrical testing and troubleshooting on all plant electrical systems and equipment Also assigns work to and supervises OEC electrical technicians and construction craftsmen in support of startup testing activities works with equipment vendors and interfaces with NEPCO engineering and construction departments as required ESSENTIAL REQUIREMENTS Operates from established and wellknown procedures under general directions Job is not supervisory in nature Receives minimum supervision Decisions are made within policy constraints Not accountable for budget preparation or compliance No operating budget New and varied work situations Job involves a moderate degree of complexity Contacts are normally made with others inside the Company Contacts are usually immediate associates and own supervisor Must be able to read electrical blueprints drawings and utilize typical test equipment associated with this position Educational requirements include AAS or year mechanicalmarine engineering degree or equivalent Eight or more years experience in major power plant equipment and system installations Knowledge of labor jurisdiction construction techniques tools and equipment and protective tagging systems required Working knowledge of power plant and associated systems PREFERRED SKILLS NA SPECIAL CHARACTERISTICS NA CONTACT NEPCO Human Resources Fax Embedded image moved to file picpcx Job ID Department START UP Company GLOBAL FUNCTIONS ENGINEER CONSTRUCT NEPCO Location BOTHELL WA Type Pay na FLSA class Manager GOULETTECHARLIE Recruiter RJOHNSON Log na Grade SAL Response NA Relocation N Posting date JUN

Re IC STARTUP ENGINEER ChanceMark This one should be defined with electrical background I would not qualify for this one Kelly Original Message From To Sent Thursday July PM Subject IC STARTUP ENGINEER IC STARTUP ENGINEER ESSENTIAL FUNCTIONS Under the direction of Startup Supervisor is responsible for the implementation of the Startup IC test program This includes reviewing plant engineering documents and PIDs performing calibration and troubleshooting of the IC equipment assigning work to OEC Startup IC Technician and construction craftsmen in support of startup testing activities Works with equipment vendors and interfaces with NEPCO engineering and construction departments as required Scopes project drawings for turnover packages ESSENTIAL REQUIREMENTS Operates from established and wellknown procedures under general directions Job is not supervisory in nature Receives minimum supervision Decisions are made within policy constraints Not accountable for budget preparation or compliance No operating budget New and varied work situations Job involves a moderate degree of complexity Contacts are normally made with others inside the Company Contacts are usually immediate associates and own supervisor PREFERRED SKILLS Must be able to read electrical blueprints IC data sheets logic drawings and utilize typical test equipment associated with this position Good communication skills oral and written helpful Education requirements include AAS or year engineering degree or equivalent or more years experience in major power plant equipment and system installations Knowledge of labor jurisdiction construction techniques tools and equipment and protective tagging systems required Working knowledge of a power plant and associated systems Previous experience in checkout or design of Distributed Control Systems a must Knowledge of power plant processes recommended SPECIAL CHARACTERISTICS The duties and responsibilities are generally performed in a plant or support services environment The position generally involves occasional sitting frequent standing occasional walking moderate to heavy lifting and carrying frequent kneeling twisting and balancing occasional climbing and frequent reaching pushingpulling grasping and operation of heavy equipment and machinery The environmental conditions generally include ambient inside temperature and lighting levels and hazardous conditions The use of protective clothing andor personal devices is generally required CONTACT Embedded image moved to file picpcx Job ID Department INSTRUMENTATION Re PROCESSMECHANICAL ENGINEER II fitMark I feel that I can do this one though I do not have specific power plant background I would say that I have industrial andor construction experience I like this one Kelly Original Message From To Sent Thursday July PM Subject PROCESSMECHANICAL ENGINEER II PROCESSMECHANICAL ENGINEER II ESSENTIAL FUNCTIONS This position requires working knowledge of contracts and purchase orders and the ability to produce complete design packages Responsible for developing project specifications review vendor approval drawings for correctness and contract requirements implement vendor information into design document and integrate into company drawings Prepare proposal statements of work equipment lists proposal drawings and other miscellaneous proposal documents ESSENTIAL REQUIREMENTS Requires a BS in Engineering and power plant industrial startup operation or construction experience consistent with the level applying for PREFERRED SKILLS NA SPECIAL CHARACTERISTICS NA CONTACT Send resumes to Via Email Via Fax NEPCO North Creek Parkway North Bothell WA Embedded image moved to file picpcx Job ID Department ENGINEERING BOTHELL Company GLOBAL FUNCTIONS ENGINEER CONSTRUCT NEPCO Location DENVER CO Type Pay na FLSA class Manager KATHERJOHN Recruiter MRYGOL Log na Grade SAL Response NA Relocation N Posting date JUN

Kelly Clarks resumeDear Mr Mark Taylor Thank you for allowing me to briefly talk to you As indicated in our conversation Mr Ivan Byers personally suggested that I call you about employment opportunities at Enron Maybe you can forward this onto your Human Resources in the Enron Energy Services Division Again please let me tell you a little about myself I am a detailed dependable proactive selfstarting Mechanical Engineer that began in research and development I have progressively moved into project management as a project engineer I have enhanced these management skills by learning new software while managing and tracking cost and schedule of projects I have managed small construction projects from inception through completion on schedule and under cost I am a past member of the Project Management Institute PMI and have taken the Study Seminars so that I can take the test to earn the Certificate PMP Project Manager Professional I plan to sit for the PMP test next spring I have excellent communication skills both up and down the organization chart whether good or requiring immediate attention I am a team builder by teaching training and mentoring I look forward to hearing from you in the near future Again thank you Respectfully submitted Kelly M Clark Resume Kelly Clark doc

work procedures required However the Essential Functions are doable Kelly Original Message From To Sent Thursday July PM Subject SUPERINTENDANT MECH SUPERINTENDANT MECH ESSENTIAL FUNCTIONS Schedule coordinate and supervise craft employee activities This will also include Plan and supervise Assistant Superintendent andor craft activities Includes determining method of construction manpower levels material quantities equipment temporary power sources work schedule and documenting actual hours worked Coordinate assigned work with work of different crafts company departments or other contractors Maintain liaison with engineering estimating and planning to ensure work complies with drawings specifications and schedule Assist in resolving construction problems lack of productivity work interfaces etc as required Assist Labor Relations Department in maintaining communications with unions resolving jurisdictional disputes requisitioning required manpower etc as necessary Monitor craft compliance with project safety program requirements document and ensure corrective measures are implemented Maintain liaison with other departments ie Material Control Purchasing Quality Control Engineering to ensure all required materials equipment inspections etc support craft activities and project schedule Perform additional assignments per supervisors direction ESSENTIAL REQUIREMENTS Educational and experience requirements include Minimum of eight years supervisory experience in similar facility construction technology methods equipment tools and work procedures required Advanced understanding of construction scheduling cost control and ability to control and supervise large groups essential PREFERRED SKILLS NA SPECIAL CHARACTERISTICS NA CONTACT Send resumes to Via Email Via Re EXPEDITER LEAD ChanceMark This one I can do with no problem with my skills If Enron could use Star Projects there would be no expediting loses or misses It has the best expediting report system that I have ever seen Kelly Original Message From To Sent Thursday July PM Subject EXPEDITER LEAD EXPEDITER LEAD ESSENTIAL FUNCTIONS Under direction from the Manager of Expediting responsible for tracking and expediting delivery of information materials and services to achieve schedules for performance incorporated into procurement documents Functional Lead for designated group of project expediters Typical Duties Cover projects during emergencies and vacations Assist Procurement Management Team to assign resources and recruiting for new project requirements Perform training or arrange training for newly hired project expediters Monitor the expediting process for future efficiencies and assuring the process is applied successfully and consistently on each project Aquire sufficient hardware and software resources to lead the group to success Analyze procurement documents to identify items to be tracked Develop model of vendor process fulfilling purchase orders to create expediting schedule Maintain and document frequent contact with vendors to identify current status of order within their company and to initiate activity with vendor to address and correct potential delays Report to Project Management and Purchasing all problems as soon as they are identified Prepare and issue status reports on all open purchase orders on a regular basis Coordinate with Construction details of delivery including special requirements for large loads ESSENTIAL REQUIREMENTS High school graduate strong oral and verbal communication skills General knowledge of the manufacturing process for capital equipment in the industry Strong PC skills including CPM scheduling word processing and spreadsheets High degree of personal organizations and attention to detail PREFERRED SKILLS NA SPECIAL CHARACTERISTICS NA CONTACT Send resumes to Via Email Via Fax NEPCO North Creek Parkway North Bothell WA Embedded image moved to file picpcx Job ID Department EXPEDITING Company GLOBAL FUNCTIONS ENGINEER CONSTRUCT NEPCO Location BOTHELL WA Type Pay na FLSA class Manager LANDISDOUG Recruiter MFERGUSON Log na Grade SAL Response NA Relocation N Posting date JUN

Re SR PROJECT MANAGER ChanceMark The description on this one I feel good about I do not have years of field experience but do have over years of project management experience However item INTERFACE WITH GOVERNMENT AGENCIES WHICH HAVE REGULATORY AUTHORITY OVER THE PROJECT AND OBTAIN THE NECESSARY PERMITS I have worked with the State of Ohio for permits and licensing I know the fundamentals but would need some direction for the state that I would be working Kelly Original Message From To Sent Thursday July PM Subject SR PROJECT MANAGER SR PROJECT MANAGER ESSENTIAL FUNCTIONS PERFORM MANAGEMENT COORDINATION AND ADMINISTRATION OF A FIELD CONSTRUCTION PROJECT TO ENSURE COMPLIANCE WITH SCHEDULES BUDGET AND TECHNICAL REQUIREMENTS OF THE CUSTOMER AND ACT AS A FOCAL POINT OF AUTHORITY AND RESPONSIBILITIES FOR THE PROJECT TYPICAL DUTIES INCLUDE BUT ARE NOT LIMITED TO ADMINISTER THE PROJECT CONTRACT INCLUDING CHANGES VARIATIONS AND OTHER AGREEMENTS AND ADMINISTER GENERAL OFFICE FUNCTIONS INTERFACE WITH CUSTOMER ENSURING SATISFACTION ON EACH PHASE OF PLANT CONSTRUCTION INCLUDING PROVIDING INFORMATION PROBLEM RESOLUTION AND NEGOTIATION OF CHANGES TO CONTRACT DIRECT THE DAYTODAY OPERATIONS OF A PROJECT INCLUDING SCHEDULING MATERIAL PROCUREMENT AND SUPERVISION OF SUPERINTENDENTS FOREMEN AND ENGINEERING SUPPORT MONITOR PROJECT COSTS AND OPERATIONAL PROGRESS ENSURING BUDGETARY AND SCHEDULING COMMITMENTS ARE MET ENFORCE SAFETY RULES AND MONITOR SAFETY PRACTICES TO ENSURE A SAFE AND HEALTHY WORK ENVIRONMENT FOR ALL WORKERS INTERFACE WITH GOVERNMENT AGENCIES WHICH HAVE REGULATORY AUTHORITY OVER THE PROJECT AND OBTAIN THE NECESSARY PERMITS ESSENTIAL REQUIREMENTS BACHELOR OR MASTERS DEGREE IN ENGINEERING DISCIPLINE OR CONSTRUCTION MANAGEMENT PLUS TEN TO FIFTEEN YEARS FIELD EXPERIENCE IN CONSTRUCTION OR FIELD ENGINEERING OR EQUIVALENT TEN YEARS PROJECT MANAGEMENT EXPERIENCE PREFERRED SUPERVISORY AND BUSINESS ADMINISTRATION TRAINING OR EXPERIENCE SUFFICIENT TO MANAGE AND CONTROL A MULTIMILLION DOLLAR PROJECT THOROUGH UNDERSTANDING OF COMMERCIAL ASPECTS OF PROJECT MANAGEMENT AND POWER PLANT OPERATIONS THOROUGH KNOWLEDGE OF TECHNICAL ASPECTS OF DESIGN AND CONSTRUCTION RELATIVE TO THE VARIOUS TRADES ABILITY TO EFFECTIVELY BOTH ORALLY AND IN WRITING DEMONSTRATED LEADERSHIP ABILITY SUFFICIENT TO MAKE WORK ASSIGNMENTS DIRECT THE WORK ACTIVITIES OF A WIDE DIVERSITY OF PEOPLE AND SHOW CREATIVITY AND ORIGINALITY IN DESIGN AND PROJECT SOLUTIONS PREFERRED SKILLS PROFIECIENCY IN MICROSOFT OFFICE IS NECCESSARY MUST BE CAPABLE OF UNDERSTANDING AND UPDATING PROJECT SCHEDULES AND FORECASTING COSTS SPECIAL CHARACTERISTICS NA CONTACT fax EMAIL Embedded image moved to file picpcx Job ID Department PROJECT MANAGEMENT Company GLOBAL FUNCTIONS ENGINEER CONSTRUCT NEPCO Location na Type Pay na FLSA class Manager RANZMICHAEL Recruiter MFERGUSON Log na Grade SAL Response NA Relocation Y Posting date JUN

Re CONSTRUCTION MANAGER ChanceMark I miss this one because of the essential reuirements of seven to ten years of field construction experience I have installed two new electric boilers and one rebuilt gas boiler I understand the all of the essential requirements but have very little HVAC backgroud Otherwise I feel pretty good about this one other than the seven to ten years field experience Kelly PS down below this one says very clearly PLEASE DO NOT CONTACT THE RECRUITER OR HIRING MANAGER Original Message From To Sent Thursday July PM Subject CONSTRUCTION MANAGER CONSTRUCTION MANAGER ESSENTIAL FUNCTIONS This position will be a part of the Construction Management Services group at Enron Facility Services Enron Facility Services has separate benefit programs from Enron Corp The Construction Manager is responsible for the successful completion of all construction associated with assigned projects The CM is responsible for the scope of work budget and schedule for assigned projects The CM will develop the scopes of work which are used to execute the subcontracts associated with each assigned project The CM must be able to simultaneously manage multiple projects and to deal effectively with the customer at a high level The CM will ensure that the safety and environmental compliance of each assigned project meets the EFS safety and environmental programs Responsibilities Manage scope of work budget and schedule for assigned construction projects Manage the budget and schedule for each project in accordance with the contracted scope of work Supervise the construction work and commissioning for each project Provide quality assurance safety and environmental compliance oversight Work within the specified project management software SureTrak Expedition MS Office Assist design team with constructability reviews and value engineering recommendations Review and comment on design drawings and sketches material submittals maintenance plans and other project documents as required Build and maintain a working relationship with EES and outside clients and all subcontractors Ensure that subcontractors maintain budget and schedule constraints ESSENTIAL REQUIREMENTS BSMEEE or Construction Management Seven to ten years of field construction experience Knowledge of electrical HVAC boiler retrofit controls hot water and condensate systems Experience in managing successful construction projects Knowledge of the construction process scheduling resource allocation budgeting and cash flow processing Ability to work well as a team player and to communicate effectively with others PREFERRED SKILLS NA SPECIAL CHARACTERISTICS NA CONTACT As an Equal OpportunityAffirmative Action Employer we are committed to diversity in our workforce Interested candidates please send your resumes via email preferred to for consideration Resumes may also be mailed to Enron Facility Services P O Box Houston TX Attn EESJOBS EBa or faxed to Please be sure to indicate Job ID in your subject line or cover letter PLEASE DO NOT CONTACT THE RECRUITER OR HIRING MANAGER Embedded image moved to file picpcx Job ID Department EES HOUMIDWEST PROJ CO Company WHOLESALE RETAIL COMM ENRON ENERGY SERVICES Location HOUSTON TX Type Pay na FLSA class Manager LEBLANCEARL Recruiter KWEEKS Log na Grade CS Response NA Relocation N Posting date JUN

Re GENERAL MGR CONSTRUCTION SVCS Mark This one is out of my league Kelly Original Message From To Sent Thursday July PM Subject GENERAL MGR CONSTRUCTION SVCS GENERAL MGR CONSTRUCTION SVCS ESSENTIAL FUNCTIONS This position will be a part of the Construction Management Services group at Enron Facility Services Enron Facility Services has separate benefit programs from Enron Corp The General Manager is responsible for the successful completion of all construction associated with energy projects within the Southeast Region The GM is responsible for the profit and loss of the regional office staffing and training of personnel and identification and development of new business within the region The GM must be able to simultaneously manage multiple Construction Managers and office personnel as well as deal effectively with EFS EES and with outside customers at a high level Responsibilities Write and implement the Business Plan for the Southeast Regional office Hire and train qualified personnel to manage project construction and office functions Hire origination and project development personnel to pursue new business outside of EES projects Build and maintain a working relationship with EFS EES and outside clients Maintain a good relationship with all inside and outside subcontractors ensure that subcontractors maintain budget and schedule constraints ESSENTIAL REQUIREMENTS BSMEEE or Construction Management Minimum of seven to ten years of field construction experience and the ability to run a regional office Knowledge of electrical HVAC boiler retrofits controls hot water and condensate systems Experience in managing successful construction projects Knowledge of the construction process scheduling resource allocation budgeting and cash flow processing Ability to work well as a team player and to communicate effectively with others PREFERRED SKILLS NA SPECIAL CHARACTERISTICS NA CONTACT As an Equal OpportunityAffirmative Action Employer we are committed to diversity in our workforce Interested candidates please send your resumes via email preferred to for consideration Resumes may also be mailed to Enron Facility Services P O Box Houston TX Attn EESJOBS EBa or faxed to Please be sure to indicate Job ID in your subject line or cover letter PLEASE DO NOT CONTACT THE RECRUITER OR HIRING MANAGER Embedded image moved to file picpcx Job ID Department EES ATLANTA DIST PROJ C Company WHOLESALE RETAIL COMM ENRON ENERGY SERVICES Location NORCROSS GA Type Pay na FLSA class Manager HUTHDOUGLAS Recruiter KWEEKS Log na Grade CS Response NA Relocation Y Posting date JUN

Re PIPING SUPERINTENDENT chanceMark This one would be hard pressed even though I think that I can do it I dont have the minimum of eight years supervisory exerience as mentioned in the essential requirements Kelly Original Message From To Sent Thursday July PM Subject PIPING SUPERINTENDENT PIPING SUPERINTENDENT ESSENTIAL FUNCTIONS Schedule coordinate and supervise craft employee activities Specifically the supervision of the piping discipline Plan and supervise Assistant Superintendent andor craft activities Includes determining method of construction manpower levels material quantities equipment temporary power sources work schedule and documenting actual hours worked Coordinate assigned work with work of different crafts company departments or other contractors Maintain liaison with engineering estimating and planning to ensure work complies with drawings specifications and schedule Assist in resolving construction problems lack of productivity work interfaces etc as required Assist Labor Relations Department in maintaining communications with unions resolving jurisdictional disputes requisitioning required manpower etc as necessary Monitor craft compliance with project safety program requirements document and ensure corrective measures are implemented Maintain liaison with other departments ie Material Control Purchasing Quality Control Engineering to ensure all required materials equipment inspections etc support craft activities and project schedule Perform additional assignments per supervisors direction ESSENTIAL REQUIREMENTS Educational and experience requirements include Minimum of eight years supervisory experience in similar facility construction technology methods equipment tools and work procedures required Advanced understanding of construction scheduling cost control and ability to control and supervise large groups essential PREFERRED SKILLS NA SPECIAL CHARACTERISTICS The duties and responsibilities are performed both inside and outside construction sites The position generally involves continuous to frequent standing frequent to occasional sitting moderate to frequent lifting carrying bending reaching kneeling twisting balancing and climbing The position also involves light to heavy equipment operation The environmental conditions generally include frequently exposed to unprotected heights exposure to uneven and wet surfaces and exposure to fumes chemicals and gases Continuous exposure to varying degrees of noises CONTACT NA Embedded image moved to file picpcx Job ID Department CONSTRUCTION Company GLOBAL Re SR PLANNING SCHEDULING ENG Mark I know four different planning and scheduling software packages but not Primavera Project Planner PG used MS Projects after using three others Neither BGP nor EGC were interested in a investment for one license I am willing to learn Primavera The understanding of activitity sequencing and relationships not a problem I feel that this one is about The only other thing missing is that on most of my projects we did not do resource allocation using the scheduling porgram Most of the projects were short The schedule was for the client to know about how much down time would be required and if weekend work would be required Kelly Original Message From To Sent Thursday July PM Subject SR PLANNING SCHEDULING ENG SR PLANNING SCHEDULING ENG ESSENTIAL FUNCTIONS This position will be responsible for sup and development of advanced CPM scheduling This includes planning development maintenance analysis of PCM schedules for large power plant projects from design through commerical operation ESSENTIAL REQUIREMENTS This position requires a BABS degree or more years of field construction assignments A minimum of years Project Controls assignment and a comprehensive understanding of activitiy sequncing and relationships between engineering procurement construction and startup Successful candidate should also possess relevant computer skills and advanced knowledge of scheduling Primavera Project Planner PREFERRED SKILLS Computer skills relative to professional experience Advanced spreadsheet skills and advanced knowledge of Primavera Project Planner P Software SPECIAL CHARACTERISTICS NA CONTACT Send resumes to Via Email Via Fax NEPCO North Creek Parkway North Bothell WA Embedded image moved to file picpcx Job ID Department PROJECT CONTROLS Company GLOBAL FUNCTIONS ENGINEER CONSTRUCT NEPCO Location BOTHELL WA Type Pay na FLSA class Manager GRIMMDOUGLAS Recruiter CBROWN Log na Grade SAL Response NA Relocation Y Posting date JUN
